unnormalised: Hey guys, pesticide usage is a big deal, especially for us farmers in Punjab. Remember that seminar at PAU, Ludhiana on 26/01/2023? Gotta be careful with all the sprays, right? Heard stories from my kaka's village near Karnal – crop damage! Maybe try neem extracts, like my nani used to do. Need better training, maybe from 14:00 hrs on 10/07/2024. Plus, think about the Rs. cost and long-term soil health. Avoid excess use after 18:00 hrs. Namaste!
normalised: Hey guys, pesticide usage is a big deal, especially for us farmers in Punjab. Remember that seminar at P A U, Ludhiana on twenty sixth January two thousand and twenty three? Gotta be careful with all the sprays, right? Heard stories from my kaka's village near Karnal – crop damage! Maybe try neem extracts, like my nani used to do. Need better training, maybe from two post meridian on tenth July two thousand and twenty four. Plus, think about the rupee cost and long-term soil health. Avoid excess use after six post meridian. Namaste!
